text: I am getting appointed an ambassador of
Goodwill at the United Nations because I
just finished a being part of a program
that was a basically a pilot program
that I went on a mission with the UN
office of crime and drugs and child
trafficking and the international
criminal court victims trust
fund and what they were trying to
do
was essentially go to Northern
Uganda and
resocialize and have the story be told
through ART making to see if that was a
viable way of telling the story of
children who had been forly abducted
soldiers boys and girls who had been
formerly abducted into sexual slavery
essentially for a rebel
Army called uh the Lord's Liberation
Front that is now roving around Northern
Uganda and the southern uh
Sudan and kidnapping children
so I went uh they asked me as the first
artist to
go um the under Secretary
General
um and start a program at a refugee camp
very large internally displaced person
Camp an IDP it's
called where people from Uganda actually
live in this refugee camp so that they
could um keep them under guard
essentially so that the kids don't get
kidnapped uh so I was just there I just
got back and I was there two weeks and I
basically painted with the
kids and there's going to be a um
Exhibition at the United Nations May of
all the
work and it's going to be for sale and
the money will go
to uh help them reconstruct their lives
and essentially send them back to school
so that's a program that they want to
get going around
Africa
